title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 20 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 20 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: Wine is a mocker, strong drink is raging: and whosoever is deceived thereby is not wise.
lineList.cn: 酒能使人亵慢，浓酒使人喧囔。凡因酒错误的，就无智慧。

lineList.en: The fear of a king is as the roaring of a lion: whoso provoketh him to anger sinneth against his own soul.
lineList.cn: 王的威吓，如同狮子吼叫。惹动他怒的，是自害己命。

lineList.en: It is an honour for a man to cease from strife: but every fool will be meddling.
lineList.cn: 远离分争，是人的尊荣。愚妄人都爱争闹。

lineList.en: The sluggard will not plow by reason of the cold; therefore shall he beg in harvest, and have nothing.
lineList.cn: 懒惰人因冬寒不肯耕种。到收割的时候，他必讨饭，而无所得。

lineList.en: Counsel in the heart of man is like deep water; but a man of understanding will draw it out.
lineList.cn: 人心怀藏谋略，好像深水。惟明哲人，才能汲引出来。

lineList.en: Most men will proclaim every one his own goodness: but a faithful man who can find?
lineList.cn: 人多述说自己的仁慈。但忠信人谁能遇着呢。

lineList.en: The just man walketh in his integrity: his children are blessed after him.
lineList.cn: 行为纯正的义人，他的子孙，是有福的。

lineList.en: A king that sitteth in the throne of judgment scattereth away all evil with his eyes.
lineList.cn: 王坐在审判的位上，以眼目驱散诸恶。

lineList.en: Who can say, I have made my heart clean, I am pure from my sin?
lineList.cn: 谁能说，我洁净了我的心。我脱净了我的罪。

lineList.en: Divers weights, and divers measures, both of them are alike abomination to the LORD.
lineList.cn: 两样的法码，两样的升斗，都为耶和华所憎恶。

lineList.en: Even a child is known by his doings, whether his work be pure, and whether it be right.
lineList.cn: 孩童的动作，是清洁，是正直，都显明他的本性。

lineList.en: The hearing ear, and the seeing eye, the LORD hath made even both of them.
lineList.cn: 能听的耳，能看的眼，都是耶和华所造的。

lineList.en: Love not sleep, lest thou come to poverty; open thine eyes, and thou shalt be satisfied with bread.
lineList.cn: 不要贪睡，免致贫穷。眼要睁开，你就吃饱。

lineList.en: It is naught, it is naught, saith the buyer: but when he is gone his way, then he boasteth.
lineList.cn: 买物的说，不好，不好。及至买去，他便自夸。

lineList.en: There is gold, and a multitude of rubies: but the lips of knowledge are a precious jewel.
lineList.cn: 有金子，和许多珍珠。（或作红宝石）惟有知识的嘴，乃为贵重的珍宝。

lineList.en: Take his garment that is surety for a stranger: and take a pledge of him for a strange woman.
lineList.cn: 谁为生人作保，就拿谁的衣服。谁为外人作保，谁就要承当。

lineList.en: Bread of deceit is sweet to a man; but afterwards his mouth shall be filled with gravel.
lineList.cn: 以虚谎而得的食物，人觉甘甜。但后来他的口，必充满尘沙。

lineList.en: Every purpose is established by counsel: and with good advice make war.
lineList.cn: 计谋都凭筹算立定。打仗要凭智谋。

lineList.en: He that goeth about as a talebearer revealeth secrets: therefore meddle not with him that flattereth with his lips.
lineList.cn: 往来传舌的，泄漏密事。大张嘴的不可与他结交。

lineList.en: Whoso curseth his father or his mother, his lamp shall be put out in obscure darkness.
lineList.cn: 咒骂父母的，他的灯必灭，变为漆黑的黑暗。

lineList.en: An inheritance may be gotten hastily at the beginning; but the end thereof shall not be blessed.
lineList.cn: 起初速得的产业，终久却不为福。

lineList.en: Say not thou, I will recompense evil; but wait on the LORD, and he shall save thee.
lineList.cn: 你不要说，我要以恶报恶。要等候耶和华，他必拯救你。

lineList.en: Divers weights are an abomination unto the LORD; and a false balance is not good.
lineList.cn: 两样的法码，为耶和华所憎恶。诡诈的天平，也为不善。

lineList.en: Man's goings are of the LORD; how can a man then understand his own way?
lineList.cn: 人的脚步，为耶和华所定。人岂能明白自己的路呢。

lineList.en: It is a snare to the man who devoureth that which is holy, and after vows to make enquiry.
lineList.cn: 人冒失说，这是圣物，许愿之后才查问，就是自陷网罗。

lineList.en: A wise king scattereth the wicked, and bringeth the wheel over them.
lineList.cn: 智慧的王，簸散恶人，用碌碡辊轧他们。

lineList.en: The spirit of man is the candle of the LORD, searching all the inward parts of the belly.
lineList.cn: 人的灵是耶和华的灯，鉴察人的心腹。

lineList.en: Mercy and truth preserve the king: and his throne is upholden by mercy.
lineList.cn: 王因仁慈和诚实，得以保全他的国位，也因仁慈立稳。

lineList.en: The glory of young men is their strength: and the beauty of old men is the grey head.
lineList.cn: 强壮乃少年的荣耀。白发为老年人的尊荣。

lineList.en: The blueness of a wound cleanseth away evil: so do stripes the inward parts of the belly.
lineList.cn: 鞭伤除净人的罪恶。责打能入人的心腹。
